Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • Note

  • public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that denotes one pitch at a certain octave.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Note(int noteID)
      A constructor that derives pitch, octive, and PitchName all from a value given to it.
      Note(java.lang.String pitch, int octave)
      Contructor type one that takes in a String pitch and a octave integer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adding a beat at startTime and for as long as durations asks for.

      Retrieves noteID for Note object;

      Returns enum value of PitchName of Note Object.
      void removeBeat(int startTime)
      Removes Beat at designated start time.
      void setPitchName(java.lang.String pitch)
      Sets enum value for PitchName of Note object.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a formatted string that contains the note's pitch and octave.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note(java.lang.String pitch,
            int octave)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Contructor type one that takes in a String pitch and a octave integer. Sets these parameters as the values for pitch and octave of the Note object.
        Parameters:
        pitch - The letter part of the Note.
        octave - The level of pitches the Note is at.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If pitch is less than 1 or more than 3, or if octave is less than zero.

      • Note

        public Note(int noteID)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        A constructor that derives pitch, octive, and PitchName all from a value given to it. Mostly used during automated creation of new Note objects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If noteID is less than one.

    • Method Detail

      • addBeat

        public void addBeat(int startTime,
                    int duration)
        Adding a beat at startTime and for as long as durations asks for.
        Parameters:
        startTime - Time at which beat should be added.
        duration - Time for which beat should be held.

      • removeBeat

        public void removeBeat(int startTime)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes Beat at designated start time.
        Parameters:
        startTime - Pinpoints time at which beat that needs to be removed starts.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If beat being removed does not exist.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a formatted string that contains the note's pitch and octave. Padded to 5 characters.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string that contains pitch and octave.

      • setPitchName

        public void setPitchName(java.lang.String pitch)
        Sets enum value for PitchName of Note object.
        Parameters:
        pitch - The letter value of the Note.

      • getNoteID

        public int getNoteID()
        Retrieves noteID for Note object;
        Returns:
        12 * (octave - 1) + getPitchName().ordinal().

      • getPitchName

        public PitchNames getPitchName()
        Returns enum value of PitchName of Note Object.
        Returns:
        PitchName
